rows.label: qst106009_msg0002
rows.name:
Third period lesson is ancient
civilization studies.

rows.label: qst106009_msg0003
rows.name:
Like for first lesson, please
read text that is on board.

rows.label: qst106009_msg0005
rows.name:
Now, Hana-san. Try read text
that is written on board.

rows.label: qst106009_msg0006
rows.name:
To obtain true education, need good
physical ability and technique.

rows.label: qst106009_msg0007
rows.name:
But lately physical abilities of
youth on the decline. Is very sad.

rows.label: qst106009_msg0008
rows.name:
So tell me, Hana-san. You
physical ability better
than lazy modern youth?
